title: Track Awesome Projects Boilerplates Updates Weekly
_seo_title: Track Awesome Projects Boilerplates (melvin0008/awesome-projects-boilerplates) Updates Weekly - Track Awesome List
description: Boilerplates for mobile and web apps

items.title: Awesome Projects Boilerplates Updates on Mar 27 - Apr 02, 2023
items.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Mar 27 - Apr 02, 2023
items.content_text:
### IOS Development.

*   [Swift 5 Module Template (⭐477)](https://github.com/fulldecent/swift5-module-template) Boilerplate for reusable Swift 5 modules.

### Microservices

*   [Webstack-micro (⭐89)](https://github.com/ferbs/webstack-micro) Demo/starter for full-stack web app using microservices architecture, with API Gateway, centralized authentication, background workers, and WebSockets.

### Python

*   [BeautyNet (⭐190)](https://github.com/cms-flash/beauty-net) A research project template for PyTorch.

### Websites

*   [HTML Website Template (⭐38)](https://github.com/fulldecent/html-website-template) Starting point for collaboratively-edited HTML websites
*   [Nextjs Blog Starter](https://creativedesignsguru.com/demo/Nextjs-Blog-Boilerplate/) Starter code for your blog based on Next.js framework
items.content_html:
IOS Development.

  • Swift 5 Module Template (⭐477) Boilerplate for reusable Swift 5 modules.

Microservices

  • Webstack-micro (⭐89) Demo/starter for full-stack web app using microservices architecture, with API Gateway, centralized authentication, background workers, and WebSockets.

Python

  • BeautyNet (⭐190) A research project template for PyTorch.

Websites

  • Nextjs Blog Starter Starter code for your blog based on Next.js framework

items.title: Awesome Projects Boilerplates Updates on Feb 06 - Feb 12, 2017
items.summary: 4 awesome projects updated on Feb 06 - Feb 12, 2017
items.content_text:
### Android Development

*   [Beginning Android Resources (⭐28k)](https://github.com/codepath/android_guides/wiki/Beginning-Android-Resources) Android Guide.
*   [Universal Music Player (⭐13k)](https://github.com/googlesamples/android-UniversalMusicPlayer) Google sample application that shows how to implement an audio media app that works across multiple form factors and provides a consistent user experience on Android phones, tablets, Auto, Wear and Cast devices.
*   [Android Architecture Blueprints (⭐45k)](https://github.com/googlesamples/android-architecture) Demonstrates a basic Model-View-Presenter architecture and showcases various TODO app implementations.

### IOS Development.

*   [iOS Boilerplate (⭐2.8k)](https://github.com/gimenete/iOS-boilerplate) Boilerplate by Gimeno.
items.content_html:
Android Development

  • Beginning Android Resources (⭐28k) Android Guide.
  • Universal Music Player (⭐13k) Google sample application that shows how to implement an audio media app that works across multiple form factors and provides a consistent user experience on Android phones, tablets, Auto, Wear and Cast devices.
  • Android Architecture Blueprints (⭐45k) Demonstrates a basic Model-View-Presenter architecture and showcases various TODO app implementations.

IOS Development.

  • iOS Boilerplate (⭐2.8k) Boilerplate by Gimeno.

items.title: Awesome Projects Boilerplates Updates on Jul 13 - Jul 19, 2015
items.summary: 26 awesome projects updated on Jul 13 - Jul 19, 2015
items.content_text:
### Android Development

*   [Android Bootstrap (⭐1)](https://github.com/AndroidBootstrap/android-bootstrap) A template/bootstrap/boilerplate application that includes tons of great open source tools and frameworks.
*   [Android Material Drawer Template (⭐674)](https://github.com/kanytu/android-material-drawer-template) An Android template with navigation drawer for material design.
*   [material-design-icons-adt-template (⭐438)](https://github.com/intrications/material-design-icons-adt-template) Android Studio / Eclipse ADT template for material-design-icons resources.
*   [AndroidKickststarter (⭐607)](https://github.com/e-biz/androidkickstartr) Framework kickstarts development which help you focus on coding.
*   [Android Annotations (⭐11k)](https://github.com/excilys/androidannotations) Fast Android Development. Easy maintainance.
*   [Android Cookbook Examples (⭐1k)](https://github.com/IanDarwin/Android-Cookbook-Examples) Collected code examples from the O'Reilly Android Cookbook.
*   [Android Basic Samples (⭐979)](https://github.com/playgameservices/android-basic-samples) Mostly game oriented samples.
*   [Android Webview Sample App (⭐64)](https://github.com/tscolari/android-webview-sample-app) Webview Sample App
*   [Android Quickstart (⭐239)](https://github.com/googledrive/android-quickstart) Quickstart application showing the Google Drive API for Android.

### IOS Development.

*   [Amaro (⭐387)](https://github.com/crushlovely/Amaro) Featureful iOS Boilerplate.
*   [Boilerplate-iOS (⭐8)](https://github.com/openaphid/Boilerplate-iOS) Boilerplate by openaphid.

### Python

*   [Django Hackathon Starter (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/DrkSephy/django-hackathon-starter) A boilerplate for Django web applications, providing various social logins and several popular API examples.
*   [bootstrapy (⭐289)](https://github.com/kirang89/bootstrapy) A bootstrap Python application, so that you can focus on writing code.
*   [Fbone (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/imwilsonxu/fbone) Fbone (Flask bone) is a Flask (Python microframework) template/bootstrap/boilerplate application.
*   [Flask-Bootstrap (⭐212)](https://github.com/esbullington/flask-bootstrap) A Flask app template with integrated SQLAlchemy, authentication, and Bootstrap frontend.
*   [Flask Boilerplate (⭐9)](https://github.com/melvin0008/FlaskBoilerplate) A very simple flask boilerplate with folder structures.
*   [Flask Foundation (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/JackStouffer/Flask-Foundation) App built with best practices.
*   [GoogleAppEngine Webapp2 Boilerplate (⭐681)](https://github.com/coto/gae-boilerplate) A Complete boilerplate for Python Webapp2 on Google App Engine
*   [Flask Appengine Template (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/kamalgill/flask-appengine-template) Flask App engine Template

### PHP

*   [Laravel Angular CouchDB (⭐10)](https://github.com/melvin0008/laravel-angular) Laravel Angular CouchDB Boilerplate

### Ruby

*   [AngularJS Rails Templates (⭐567)](https://github.com/pitr/angular-rails-templates) Rails and Angular Tempate.
*   [AngularJS Sinatra Bootstrap](https://github.com/dannolan/angularjs-sinatra-bootstrap-template) Angular Sinatra Bootstrap template.
*   [Rails Composer](http://railsapps.github.io/rails-composer/) Use Rails Composer to generate any of the example applications from the RailsApps project.

### .NET

*   [ASP.NET Boilerplate (⭐12k)](https://github.com/aspnetboilerplate/aspnetboilerplate) ASP.NET Boilerplate is a starting point for new modern web applications using best practices and most popular tools.

### Websites

*   [Web Starter Kit (⭐18k)](https://github.com/google/web-starter-kit) Web starter kit by Google.
*   [OSWD](http://www.oswd.org/) Platform for sharing standards-compliant free web design templates
items.content_html:
Android Development

  • Android Bootstrap (⭐1) A template/bootstrap/boilerplate application that includes tons of great open source tools and frameworks.
  • Android Material Drawer Template (⭐674) An Android template with navigation drawer for material design.
  • material-design-icons-adt-template (⭐438) Android Studio / Eclipse ADT template for material-design-icons resources.
  • AndroidKickststarter (⭐607) Framework kickstarts development which help you focus on coding.
  • Android Annotations (⭐11k) Fast Android Development. Easy maintainance.
  • Android Cookbook Examples (⭐1k) Collected code examples from the O'Reilly Android Cookbook.
  • Android Basic Samples (⭐979) Mostly game oriented samples.
  • Android Webview Sample App (⭐64) Webview Sample App
  • Android Quickstart (⭐239) Quickstart application showing the Google Drive API for Android.

IOS Development.

  • Amaro (⭐387) Featureful iOS Boilerplate.
  • Boilerplate-iOS (⭐8) Boilerplate by openaphid.

Python

  • Django Hackathon Starter (⭐1.6k) A boilerplate for Django web applications, providing various social logins and several popular API examples.
  • bootstrapy (⭐289) A bootstrap Python application, so that you can focus on writing code.
  • Fbone (⭐1.7k) Fbone (Flask bone) is a Flask (Python microframework) template/bootstrap/boilerplate application.
  • Flask-Bootstrap (⭐212) A Flask app template with integrated SQLAlchemy, authentication, and Bootstrap frontend.
  • Flask Boilerplate (⭐9) A very simple flask boilerplate with folder structures.
  • Flask Foundation (⭐1.3k) App built with best practices.
  • GoogleAppEngine Webapp2 Boilerplate (⭐681) A Complete boilerplate for Python Webapp2 on Google App Engine
  • Flask Appengine Template (⭐1.1k) Flask App engine Template

PHP

  • Laravel Angular CouchDB (⭐10) Laravel Angular CouchDB Boilerplate

Ruby

  • AngularJS Rails Templates (⭐567) Rails and Angular Tempate.
  • AngularJS Sinatra Bootstrap Angular Sinatra Bootstrap template.
  • Rails Composer Use Rails Composer to generate any of the example applications from the RailsApps project.

.NET

  • ASP.NET Boilerplate (⭐12k) ASP.NET Boilerplate is a starting point for new modern web applications using best practices and most popular tools.

Websites

  • Web Starter Kit (⭐18k) Web starter kit by Google.
  • OSWD Platform for sharing standards-compliant free web design templates
